instructions.ar: انعطف يميناً قليلاً نحو Shibuya Crossing
instructions.da: Drej let til højre videre ved Shibuya Crossing
instructions.de: Leicht rechts weiter an Shibuya Crossing
instructions.en: Make a slight right at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete dekstren ĉe Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es: Dobla levemente a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es-ES: Doble levemente a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Jatka loivasti oikeaan tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à droite en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה קלות ימינה כדי להישאר על Shibuya Crossing
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén jobbra az Shibuya Crossing
instructions.id: Make a slight right at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a destra al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.my: Shibuya Crossingပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ညာဘက်အနည်းငယ်ကွေ့ပါ
instructions.no: Sving svakt til høyre i Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w łagodny zakręt na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ro: Virați ușor la dreapta la Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните направо на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo desno na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.tr: Shibuya Crossing konumunda sağa hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно праворуч щоб залишитись на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên phải ở Shibuya Crossing

instructions.zh-Hans: Make a slight right at Shibuya Crossing
